skill_statement: Employed HTML / CSS / JavaScript / TypeScript to create static and dynamic single paged websites for school and personal use.
Leveraged GitHub/GitLab Source Controls to collaborate on shared repositories with professors and classmates while working on web design projects and code revision and review assessments.
Successfully created Command Line Interface programs in the C/C++ language on a Linux server for school coursework.
Constructed a relational database, using PostgreSQL, containing flight information with statistics being sourced from the Bureau of Transportation.
Queried relational databases using PostgreSQL in order to answer posed questions.
Increased coding productivity using Visual Studio Code an integrated development environment to write, compile, execute and debug files/projects.
Studied asymptotic time/space complexities of written programs to increase the run time efficiency of graded course assignments.
Basic-Intermediate level understanding of the German Language after completing an academic year abroad as a CBYX-PPP scholarship recipient in 2017.
